org.apache.hivemind.lib
Interface RemoteExceptionCoordinator

All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteExceptionCoordinatorImpl
public interface RemoteExceptionCoordinator

Coordinates propogation of remote events. Manages a list of RemoteExceptionListener and will perform notifications on demand. This allows objects which cache remote data to discard it after a remote exception.

This service is available as .

Author:
Howard Lewis Ship
